```{r}
require(devtools)
require(annmatrix)
require(stringr)
require(CVXR)
require(gurobi)
require(ggplot2)
require(igraph) # for hypervolume scalarization
load_all()

Nfreq        =  3
tlim         =  20  
Nmeas        =  24 
threads_glob =  8

mtdf=NULL
control=list(
  Nmeas=Nmeas,
  Nfine=144,
  Nfreq=Nfreq,
  fmin=1,
  fmax=24,
  PreSolve=2,
  MIPFocus=2,
  cvxr_verbose=T,
  time_limit=tlim,
  maxit=1e9,
  MIPGapAbs=.005,
  NodefileStart=Inf,
  prob_formulation='max_elemwise'
  )


res=solve_cvxr(control,Threads=threads_glob,cfuntype='ncp')


data.frame(time=res$mtvalue) %>% ggplot(aes(x=time,y=1))+geom_point()
```
